Question
========
  
A researcher wishes to determine if the mean score on a standardized reading test is significantly higher than 3. According to the test makers the mean is 3.00 with a standard deviation of 0.95. A random sample of 25 third graders scored an average of 3.20 on the reading test. What are the characteristics of the comparison distribution for this testing scenario? 
  
Answerlist
----------
* $N(3.00, 0.19)$
* $N(3.20, 0.19)$
* $N(3.00, 1.05)$
* $t(25)$
